metadata.title: CVE-2021-29990 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Mozilla developers and community members reported memory safety bugspresent in Firefox 90. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memorycorruption and we presume that with enough effort some of these could havebeen exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox <91.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
